titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the credit for health insurance costs of eligible individuals.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the credit for health insurance costs of eligible individuals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill extends through 2025 the tax credit for the health insurance costs of individual taxpayers and their family members.
